name: Tumblr Dash - Bioshock: Infinite
description: A Tumblr Dashboard theme celebrating Bioshock: Infinite. This is my first full theme, huzzah! [NOTE: the circular avatars were conflicting with the new layout as of 5/30, so I have removed them. If they're causing you trouble, just replace with the current version of the code and it should be fine!]
additional_info:
Art by Irrational's Robb Waters (lithographs here), edited for the theme by me. Vigor images taken mostly from the Bioshock Wikia articles on them. Songbird home icon made by me from a screencap from the game. Initial base from code used in
Tumblr dashboard - Wooden Swan - Never betray you (angelic37) / CC BY-NC-SA 3.0
Preview screenshots at 1366x768, best viewed at that or up to 1600x900, in Chrome. Blurred bits don't hide anything theme critical.
